title: Not playing rank games and not getting penalty - leaving lobby
body:
I have a question
I wont be able to play a rank games for longer period of time.
I wonder how i could not get penalty for not being active. So, i ask you if i just log in for a minute in the middle of my 'vacation' and just start rank game, leave the lobby, get punished for that (losing few lp). Will it reset my counter of days not being active ?

replies.body: Every one deserves a vacation! If you submit a ticket over to our [account team ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)we can deactivate it until you get back. Hope you have fun wherever you're going though.
